messages.title: The Lib Dems Are Winning
messages.content: European Election results here in the East Midlands show the Lib Dems CAN win and are the Remain party that can win in Nottingham.

Britain today is less fair than ever. People who work hard and play by the rules should be able to get on in life, but our failing politics means that more and more people can't. The Liberal Democrats will build an economy that works for everyone. Climate change and air pollution threaten our future. Working with the EU enables us to work together to protect our planet. The Liberal Democrats will put Britain on a path to becoming carbon neutral at the earliest possible date.
